reviewText: These are two great movies,the first movie starts with a chick walking to her room when she hears some noise coming from the next room,she peeks to see whats the cause,and she sees her little brother masturbating by looking the video of "Glamorous YUA",then she starts to think "What a Great Opportunity This Would Be",she goes in with out him noticing shes there,from there is only sex. The next movie is with the chick you see in the screen of the first movie having sex with some guy. These are great movies,with good animation,and good sound,I totally recommend buying this DVD,but...,that is,only if you like this kind of movies!.
